getPointerId(android.view.MotionEvent, i.Description: Call @B_android#view#MotionEvent#getPointerId_E@ directly. This method will be removed in a future release. Call @B_android#view#MotionEvent#getPointerId_E@.

Returns: The value of the axis, or 0 if the axis is not available.
Parameters: int: The axis identifier for the axis value to retrieve.
int: Raw index of pointer to retrieve. Value may be from 0 (the first pointer that is down) to @B_android#support#v4#view#MotionEventCompat#getPointerCount_E@-1.
getAxisValue(android.view.MotionEvent, i.Description: Call @B_android#view#MotionEvent#getAxisValue_E@ directly. This method will be removed in a future release. Returns the value of the requested axis for the given pointer index (use @B_android#support#v4#view#MotionEventCompat#getPointerId_E@ to find the pointer identifier for this index).
